title: Software Engineer
shortDescription: Enhanced service reliability by developing a custom Spring Boot proxy, improving test reliability to 98%. Delivered technical presentations to 40+ engineers, and managed multiple CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.

title: Teaching Assistant
shortDescription: Helped run lab sessions for Object Oriented Programming, supporting over 500 students weekly and boosting student satisfaction by 12%.

title: Personal Tutor
shortDescription: Tutored 4 students, improving their predicted grades by 2 levels on average by adapting teaching methods to individual learning styles.

title: Student Ambassador for EPS
shortDescription: Aided in the operation of an Open Day event, providing tours and information to over 400 prospective students and parents, promoting the university's academic offerings.

title: Work Experience - Vodafone
shortDescription: Shadowed industry professionals, including data scientists, to learn about the role of data science and AI in the telecommunications sector.

title: Work Experience - NICE Systems
shortDescription: Participated in a 'Dragons' Den' style project to create a product combining AI and psychology for police interview situations. Delivered a persuasive pitch, securing 'investment' from 4 out of 5 dragons.
